title: Drugs plan aims to help 300,000 problem drug users
content: A new drugs strategy will mean more funding for treatment and a crackdown on gangs, ministers say.

title: Drugs plan aims to help 300,000 problem drug users
content: A new drugs strategy will mean more funding for treatment and a crackdown on gangs, ministers say.

title: Union loses legal challenge in Patel bullying case
content: Boris Johnson kept his home secretary in place, saying she had not broken ministerial rules.

title: Arthur Labinjo-Hughes review to begin next week
content: The investigation focuses on the six-year-old tortured and killed by his father and stepmother.

title: No probe over MP Duncan Smith's work for gel maker
content: The former Tory leader had been accused of a conflict of interest over his role writing a report.

title: Governments hid fire risks, Grenfell inquiry hears
content: A lawyer for victims of the 2017 fire says the "concealment" of safety risks is a "major scandal".

title: Navy rape complainant backs civilian court trials
content: The woman says there were serious failings in the handling of her rape case by a military court.

title: Two Conservative councillors defect ahead of poll
content: Anthony Allen becomes the first elected official of Reclaim, while Mark Whittle joins Reform UK.
